DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Moves the entity in a turn. The turn can be to a heading, around a part of a circle, or a never-ending turn. In the first two cases, the entity will continue moving on the final heading after the turn is complete.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>turnType</myVariableName> <myType>radio-combo</myType> <myLabel>Turn Type</myLabel> <myToolTip>Select whether turn is to a heading, around a part of a circle, or continuous. Determines which parameter below to use.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>Continuous turn</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>To heading;Around a part of a circle;Continuous turn</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>finalHeading</myVariableName> <myType>heading</myType> <myLabel>Final Heading</myLabel> <myToolTip>The heading to turn to.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>0</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-3.1415926535897931</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>6.2831853071795862</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>1</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>turnCirclePortion</myVariableName> <myType>heading</myType> <myLabel>Heading Change</myLabel> <myToolTip>How many degrees to turn left or right</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>1.570796326795</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>0</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>6.2831853071795862</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>1</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName></myVariableName> <myType>separator</myType> <myLabel></myLabel> <myToolTip></myToolTip> <myDefaultValue></myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>turnRateSelector</myVariableName> <myType>radio-combo</myType> <myLabel>Turn Rate Selector</myLabel> <myToolTip>Whether the turn rate is specified by a turn circle diameter or heading change rate.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>Heading change rate</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>Turn circle diameter;Heading change rate</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>turnDiameter</myVariableName> <myType>range</myType> <myLabel>Turn Diameter</myLabel> <myToolTip>Diameter of the circular turn path.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>1000</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>0</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>1</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>turnRate</myVariableName> <myType>turnrate</myType> <myLabel>Heading Change Rate</myLabel> <myToolTip>The turn rate in degrees/sec, which will produce paths with different diameters depending on speed.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>0.0174533</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>0.0017453292519943296</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>6.2831853071795862</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>1</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName></myVariableName> <myType>separator</myType> <myLabel></myLabel> <myToolTip></myToolTip> <myDefaultValue></myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>turnDirection</myVariableName> <myType>radio-combo</myType> <myLabel>Turn Direction</myLabel> <myToolTip>Which way to turn. "Toward heading" will turn the closest way to the final heading. "Starboard" or "Port" forces a turn in that direction.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>Starboard</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>Toward heading / starboard;Port;Starboard</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
